Name: RTMPS-Server
Overview: This Docker image can be used to create a video streaming server that supports RTMP, RTMPS, HLS, DASH out of the box. It also allows adaptive streaming and custom transcoding of video streams. All modules are built from source on Debian and Alpine Linux base images.

RTMP Port.Name: RTMP Port
RTMP Port.Description: The port to accept an RTMP stream on.

RTMPS Port.Name: RTMPS Port
RTMPS Port.Description: The port to accept an RTMPS stream on.

Players &amp; Stats Port.Name: Players & Stats Port
Players &amp; Stats Port.Description: The port used to access the built in players and stats page.

SSL Certificate Domain.Name: SSL Certificate Domain
SSL Certificate Domain.Description: Defines the domain the default self sigend certificate will be valid for.

User ID.Name: User ID
User ID.Description: Sets the User ID that will own the /assets directory

Group ID.Name: Group ID
Group ID.Description: Sets the Group ID that will own the /assets Directory

Players &amp; Configs.Name: Players & Configs
Players &amp; Configs.Description: Directory where the containers config files and player pages will be stored.
